comments:
Look at addChildVisual(...) implementation: it tests if child is border item 
and adds it to border items container or main figure. Index provided to this 
method is edit part index and it is correct only when single container figure 
is used. When border item got added and then normal child got added index is 1 
but main figure has no children so it is out of bounds.

Simple solution is to provide -1 for main figure; complex solution is to 
recalculate index.
